Class MovieListingControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerClasses.MovieListingControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValidationControl

    public class MovieListingControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Control class used by both the customer and admin side of thing to deal with the dynamic formating of show time based on today's date.
    Author:
    Chang En Kai
